short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mint is a tool that helps you get better at chess.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mint V2 is a chess learning/training extension that will help you get better in chess in no time!

We do not condone cheating nor should be used to cheat, this is simply to learn.

We work on chess.com and soon more!
